content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 5, Basel 1.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 5, Basel 1.
Taulant Xhaka (Basel) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Fabian Schär (Basel).
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Nacho (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Behrang Safari.
Attempt missed. Breel Embolo (Basel) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Behrang Safari.
Offside, Basel. Taulant Xhaka tries a through ball, but Derlis González is caught offside.
Pepe (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Pepe (Real Madrid).
Breel Embolo (Basel) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Luca Zuffi (Basel) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by James Rodríguez (Real Madrid).
Attempt missed. Breel Embolo (Basel) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Luca Zuffi with a cross following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Basel. Matías Delgado replaces Fabian Frei.
Foul by Nacho (Real Madrid).
Yoichiro Kakitani (Basel) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Chicharito replaces Karim Benzema.
Attempt missed. Mohamed El Neny (Basel) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Breel Embolo with a headed pass.
Goal!  Real Madrid 5, Basel 1. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Cristiano Ronaldo.
Offside, Real Madrid. Pepe tries a through ball, but Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
